paragraph: NBC’s Tom Winter and Peter Alexander, former NY homeland security adviser Michael Balboni, former FBI Asst. Dir. Frank Figliuzzi, fmr. national counterterrorism center director Michael Leiter, WaPo’s Ashley Parker, and LA Times’ Eli Stokols on bombing packages targeting CNN, the Clinton, the Obamas & other prominent DemocratsOct. 24, 2018© 2018 NBC UNIVERSAL
